contextId.information: AT: "the people brought the ark of the covenant of Yahweh to the city of David" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_personification]])
contextId.quote: the ark of the covenant of Yahweh came to the city of David

contextId.information: Everything on earth brings glory to God. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_personification]])
AT: "The sea will make a very loud shout." (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_personification]])
This speaks about the trees as if they were people who could shout for joy. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_personification]])
contextId.quote: let the trees in the forest shout for joy
